span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. （在事实和宣称之间的）差异或矛盾： divergence or disagreement, as between facts or claims
【例】 a large discrepancy between the ideal image and the reality 理想与现实之间的巨大差距
【近】 contrast, disagreement, disparity, dissimilarity, distance, distinction, diversity
【反】 converge concord consonant 一致，和谐；analogousness, community, resemblance, similarity 相似

【记】 describe 描绘， dis 表示否定，描绘的不对，与实际有差距
